(patched) M5.

No analysis on this.  I have the following entry in my log several times. Is 
this "normal"?

(Using IBM JDK 1.3.0 20010502)

!STACK org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException[5010]: 
com.sun.jdi.InvalidStackFrameException

This is not harmful - it means we were attempting to retrieve hover help for a 
variable in a java editor while the program was running. We should handle the 
error more gracefully, since we can detect the error state before/and after it 
occurrs (i.e. check if the thread is running before asking for a variable, and 
if the thread happens to resume, we can check the status code on the resulting 
exception, and not log and error).
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 13948 ***
